title: Trump’s Celebrity Lawyer Team for Impeachment
itunes:title: Trump’s Celebrity Lawyer Team for Impeachment
description:
Brad Moss, a partner at Mark Zaid, discusses President Trump adding some high profile, controversial lawyers to his defense team and whether witnesses will be called at the impeachment trial. He speaks to host June Grasso.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
